channel.title: Rick and Morty on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Rick and Morty on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Rick and Morty’ Creator Dan Harmon on Season 8 Tinkering and Fans Pushing for More From the Multiverse
item.description: Harmon tells The Hollywood Reporter that he has already written season 10 episodes, which he jokes has led to confusion for him about when everything is airing: “I’ve become my own Chevy Chase.”

item.title: ‘Rick and Morty’ Creator Dan Harmon on Season 8 Tinkering and Fans Pushing for More From the Multiverse
item.description: Harmon tells The Hollywood Reporter that he has already written season 10 episodes, which he jokes has led to confusion for him about when everything is airing: “I’ve become my own Chevy Chase.”
